posts.content:
I've taken this off my bus to fit a vintage speed, so it needs a new home.
Header and box.
No holes, works perfectly.
Has a small dent in the U on right of the box where it was knocking my shock and a weld on the left of the box to shorten it to stop it knocking my shock.

It's in Hemel Hempstead Hertfordshire.
But I can take it to Busfest.
Â£50
